mapper.select: select emp.name as empName, card.id as cardId, emp.id as empId, emp.no as empNo, emp.mobile as mobile, emp.id_card as idCard, card.current_balance as currentBalance, card.validity_time as validityTime, emp.origination_name as orgName from employee as emp, ic_card as card where card.employee_id = emp.id and card.deleted = 0 and card.id = #{cardId} limit 0 ,1
